risks: Need to test across different screen sizes to ensure optimal height values

detailed_analysis.root_cause: The typing animation cycles through phrases of varying lengths ('Machine Learning Researcher' being the longest at ~27 characters vs 'Engineering Lead' at ~16 characters), causing the .hero-title container to dynamically resize and create layout shifts.
detailed_analysis.solution_approach: Increase the min-height values in .hero-title CSS class to accommodate the longest phrase 'Machine Learning Researcher' across all screen sizes
testing_requirements: Verify no layout shifts occur during typing animation
Test on mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports
Ensure no excessive white space is introduced
Validate with different browser zoom levels

issue_title: Bug: Hero section moves up and down when typing animation changes text length
